title: Riot; Please fix this warding/autopath bug
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LYqSdsIPBaA

Literally one of the most obnoxious bugs ever. Sometime's when I'm playing lee or jax ill go to wardhop the wall and instead this happens.

replies.body: If you click just over halfway into the wall it should solve that. The problem (I think) is that you are trying to ward _just out of range_. But if you place a ward just over halfway through the wall, it auto drops it on the other side in a straight line between your champion and the place you clicked.
